name: json_tools
author: johnsonfung
description: Transform, filter, and manipulate JSON and CSV data with powerful tools

preferences.label: Preferred Key Casing
preferences.description: Default casing style for JSON keys when converting from CSV

commands.name: csv_to_json
commands.description: Convert CSV to JSON array of objects using first row as keys

commands.name: json_sort
commands.description: Sort array of objects by a key value

commands.name: json_filter
commands.description: Filter array of objects keeping only items matching criteria

commands.name: json_filter_out
commands.description: Filter array of objects removing items matching criteria

commands.name: json_add_key
commands.description: Add a key-value pair to all objects in array

commands.name: json_remove_key
commands.description: Remove a key from all objects in array

commands.name: json_set_key
commands.description: Set a key to a specific value in all objects

commands.name: json_append_key
commands.description: Append value to the end of existing key values

commands.name: json_prepend_key
commands.description: Prepend value to the beginning of existing key values

commands.name: json_dupes
commands.description: Find and display duplicate objects by key value

commands.name: json_dedupe
commands.description: Remove exact duplicate objects from array

commands.name: json_sort_array
commands.description: Sort an array of primitive values (strings/numbers)
